metadata.title: Can Ethernet and EtherCAT communication be used simultaneously with the RZ/T2L?

sections.content:
Question:
Can Ethernet and EtherCAT communication be used simultaneously with the RZ/T2L?
Answer:
The Ethernet and EtherCAT communication ports can be used simultaneously. 
Either three EtherCAT ports or two EtherCAT ports and one Ethernet port can be selected in the MDOCTRL settings. 
For details, refer to the following items. 
RZ/T2L Group User’s Manual: Hardware (r01uh0985ej0100-rzt2l)
Table 26.4 MAC-PHY interface mode
